title: Chrome Blade Mk.II
description: High-frequency katana with customizable neon resonance colors and combo finishers.
longDescription: Chrome Blade Mk.II rebuilds the legendary monoknife with phase-edge tech, bespoke attacks, and color-calibrated trails. The package includes CET toggles, custom sound layers, and upgrade materials so players can integrate it with existing save files instantly.
featureList: Six-step combo tree with optional phase finisher
Neon resonance coloration tied to equipped cyberware
Integrated CET panel for damage curve tuning
